<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_doc.DocumentTemplateBlockAjaxSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Ajax script include to fetch Document Template block's information</description>
        <name>DocumentTemplateBlockAjaxSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DocumentTemplateBlockAjaxSNC = Class.create();

DocumentTemplateBlockAjaxSNC.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
		
		
	/**
	*
	* Gets the detailed snippet of the blocks being inserted
	*
	* @return JSON 
	*/
	getBlockSnippet: function(){
		var result = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_doc_template_block');
		if(gr.canRead()){
			var blockSysIds = this.getParameter('sysparm_dtblockSysId');
			result = new DocumentTemplateBlockUtils().getBlockSnippet(blockSysIds);
		}
		
		return result;
	},
	
	getAllowedBlockTablesForTemplate: function() {
		
		var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
		if(gs.nil(table))
			return '[]';

        var templateId = this.getParameter('sysparm_template');

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_doc_html_template');
        if (gs.nil(templateId) && !gr.canCreate())
            return '[]';

        if (!gs.nil(templateId) && (!gr.get(templateId) || !gr.canWrite()))
            return '[]';

        var tablesList = new GlideTableHierarchy(table).getTables();
        return tablesList.toString();
		
		
	},
	
	getDTBlocks: function() {
		var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
		if(gs.nil(table))
			return '{}';
		var queryParams = {
			searchKeyword : this.getParameter('sysparm_searchKeyword'),
			table : table
		};
		var templateId = this.getParameter('sysparm_template');
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_doc_html_template');
        if (gs.nil(templateId) && !gr.canCreate())
            return '{}';

        if (!gs.nil(templateId) && (!gr.get(templateId) || !gr.canRead()))
            return '{}';
		
		var result = new DocumentTemplateBlockUtils().getDTBlocks(queryParams);

		return JSON.stringify(result);
	},
	
			
	type: "DocumentTemplateBlockAjaxSNC"
});]]></script>
